name: TankCity
description:
U r driving this cool looking tank around a colorful city, patrolling the streets, keeping it 'safe', when suddenly U spot a whole gang of them, annoying little robots, hovering over the city!

So what would U do?

U'd start blasting them THAT'S what!!


This is my first game in unity!! I'm still developing it though!! Most of the art is my own, or modified, including 3D models and textures!

How to play! > Drive the tank with arrow keys, fire with space and adjust canon with 'W' and 'S'.
